codelist-item.name: Actual End
codelist-item.description: The actual end date, such as date of last disbursement
codelist-item.name: fin-réelle
Planned End
codelist-item.description: The planned end date as recorded in project documentation
codelist-item.name: fin-prévue
Actual Start
codelist-item.description: The actual start date, such as date of first disbursement
codelist-item.name: début-réel
Planned Start
codelist-item.description: The planned start date as recorded in project documentation. Can be date of signature of activity agreement or approval by relevant body
codelist-item.name: début-prévu
